fields.name: Admin
fields.description:
- Add new users
- Set user rights for all other users
- Have full user rights

- Assign user accounts for CMMS team
- Create/edit/delete WOs.
- Assign WO to CMMS operator 
- View all reports and set filters

fields.name: CMMS Operator
fields.description:
- Accept/Reject WO
- Assign/edit WO info and dates assign to Operator
- Sign-off WO when completed 
- View reports and set filters

fields.name: CMMS Viewer
fields.description:
- View WOs, reports and set filters 
- Cannot edit

fields.name: Dashboard  Viewer
fields.description:
- View/query maps and reports 
- Set filters
